player.back_history: A once‑honored forge‑master named Tharok Ironhand, whose family line was sealed in the Obsidian Forge after the dwarven war, seeks redemption by confronting the Molten Maw that devours his homeland. Driven by a desperate need to free his kin and restore balance, Tharok has left the surface, armed with ancestral tools and a burning resolve.

tile.description: A massive obsidian crystal pulsing with molten gold veins, the very core of Khar‑Gorath’s sealing fire.

final_objective.back_history: The Heartstone of Khar‑Gorath was forged by the dwarven smiths as the living core of the eternal fire that sealed the Obsidian Forge. When the kingdom fell, the stone was buried beneath the molten heart, its radiant heat kept the Maw at bay. The corruptive Molten Maw has grown hungry for the stone’s power, seeking to absorb it and unleash its fury upon the world. Only by retrieving the Heartstone and carrying it to the surface can the player restore the sealing spell, redirect the Maw’s hunger, and prevent the mountain from erupting into a world‑shattering inferno. The goblin king covets the stone to forge an army of magma‑forged war‑lords; leaving it buried would allow the Maw to consume the mountain and spill ash across the kingdoms.
